body: So I've come back to finish reading this one and here are some of my opinions: I totally felt the gangbang scene was unnecessary but also justfiable in the sense that you can skip that scene and go with the divorce it would not impact story but at the same time, as some sort of "fan service" to those who like that kind of fetish; I question here... what the hell happened then with the supposedly GF, because that kinda left an impression that since they had 3P, it would be a harem and then this son-mother couple just eloped; the park scene with two geezers taking part was just absurd but also likely "fan service" to exhibitionism; final pages were OK, it explains a point in narrative. Story was alright, too much crap crammed into it, but art is way delicious.
Knew the first three chapters where too good to be true fucking cuck artist eat a dick and burn in hell pathetic bitches -50/10
@ShisuiXX is the real MVP of this comments section!
hmm feels like i read something similar like this
Why did i get a boner while seeing someone getting gangbanged??

From what I remember the explanation for the gangbang *roughly* is as follows. Her husband caught her cheating on him with her son, and while he knew it was over for their marriage he wanted payback. She did cheat on him for QUITE some time right under his nose, in his own house, etc. So he had her gangbanged and the unspoken agreement was they’d divorce after then her and her son would be together. Primarily for pride more than anything. She let it happen too because she felt like she deserved to atone to an extent for cheating on him for so long. It’s not like she wanted to do it or enjoyed it per say, but at the same time she realized she fucked him over & he just wanted 1 thing for payback. Gangbangs like this are never good, but at the same time this one was more fair than most I feel. While you aren’t on the husband’s side you can see where he was coming from cuz he was a decent guy iirc just disabled & he got cheated on. I still love the MC & the wife tho. Wholesome.
